data.expected_result: You should be able to connect without issues
data.short_description: On Firefox nightly (version 63.0a1 (2018-08-10) (64-bit)) voice chat does not work at all
data.steps_to_repro: - Use Firefox Nigthly 63.0a1 64-bit - Attempt to join a voice channel - Observe the forever RTC connecting loop
